document.docAuthor: Ziani, Stefano, Abdel-Dayem, Mahmoud Saleh, Aldhafer, Hathal Mohammed & Barbero, Enrico
document.masterDocTitle: An overview of the Onthophagini from the Arabian Peninsula (Coleoptera: Scarabaeoidea: Scarabaeidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An overview of the Onthophagini from the Arabian Peninsula (Coleoptera: Scarabaeoidea: Scarabaeidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Literature quotes .
SAUDI
ARABIA
: without locality ( Gestro 1889 ); Makkah Province , Jeddah ( Zunino 1981 ).
YEMEN
: Lahij Governorate , Lahej [Al Houta]. Al Hudaydah Governorate , Kamaran Island (Scott in Paulian 1948 ).
UNITED
ARAB
EMIRATES
: Abu Dhabi Emirate , Al Al-‘Ayn ( Gillett 1995 ). Fujairah Emirate , Fujairah . Ra’s al Khaymah Emirate , Khor Khuwair ( Král & Batelka 2017 ).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 8–13 . Onthophagini of Arabian Peninsula. 8,
Onthophagus ( Furconthophagus ) aethiopicus d’Orbigny, 1902
: YE (Sana’a) Alharf; 9,
Onthophagus ( Furconthophagus ) frontalis Raffray, 1877
: YE (Sana’a) Wadi Dhahr; 10,
Onthophagus ( Furconthophagus ) rugulipennis Fairmaire, 1887
: YE (Sana’a) Wadi Dhahar; 11,
Onthophagus ( Furconthophagus ) sellatus Klug, 1845
: SA (Riyadh) Deirab; 12,
Onthophagus ( Furconthophagus ) variegatus ( Fabricius, 1798 )
: YE (Sana’a) Wadi Dhahr; 13,
Onthophagus ( Indonthophagus ) nitidulus Klug, 1856
: OM (Dhofar) Salalah. Photos by Gabriele Fiumi.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution . Arabian Peninsula:
Saudi Arabia
( Gestro 1889 ), United Arab Emirates ( Gillett 1995 ), Yemen (Scott in Paulian 1948 ). North Africa: Egypt ( Baraud 1985 ). Africa: Eritrea , Ethiopia , Somalia , Sudan ( Balthasar 1963 ). Asia: Afghanistan , Iran , Iraq , Pakistan ( Ziani & Bezděk 2016 ).

Remarks . First record from Oman . Kabakov (2006) placed the species in the subgenus
Indonthophagus
. The subgeneric placement of Kabakov is tentatively followed here.
